titleStmt.title: The VVelch mans inventory han infentory of the covdes of William Morgan, ap Renald, ap Hugh, ap Richard, ap Thomas, ap Evan, ap Rice, in the county of Clamorgan, Shentleman.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Lambert dwelling in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
